Otherwise, the material, color and style are exactly as pictured and so pretty on.  Can be worn with jeans or skirt....so PRETTY!
I love the color on color embroidery that gives this sleeveless top from India a unique look.
Can’t believe the quality of this top! Received so many  compliments on 1st day! Awesome. Wish there were more

评论概述: Great design but runs small and smell of dye can be overwhelming
评论详情: I sent this shirt back for two reasons - one that it ran small even though I ordered up based on other reviews and two because the smell of the dye was just too strong.  But it was a nice shirt in design - although colors were duller than the look in the picture online.
Adorable tank, well crafted and original design. Be aware though that it runs a bit smaller so size up. Materials used are very soft and colors bright but aged in effect, very pretty!
